groups.name: quickpay.providers
groups.description: Configuration properties for QuickPay payment provider integration.

groups.name: quickpay.providers.common
groups.description: Common configuration shared across all payment providers.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable QuickPay payment provider integration.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.health-check-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable provider health checks.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.stripe.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Stripe payment provider.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.stripe.api-key
properties.description: Stripe API key (must start with 'sk_' for secret key or 'pk_' for publishable key).

properties.name: quickpay.providers.paypal.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable PayPal payment provider.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.paypal.client-id
properties.description: PayPal client ID for OAuth authentication.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.paypal.client-secret
properties.description: PayPal client secret for OAuth authentication.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.paypal.mode
properties.description: PayPal mode: 'sandbox' for testing or 'live' for production.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.common.timeout
properties.description: Request timeout for provider API calls.

properties.name: quickpay.providers.common.retry-attempts
properties.description: Number of retry attempts on provider API failures.
